channel.title: Privilege-Escalation on CyFun

item.title: CVE-2025-32324: Android ActivityManagerShellCommand Authentication Bypass Leading to LaunchAnyWhere
item.description: Deep analysis of CVE-2025-32324, a critical authentication bypass vulnerability in Android’s ActivityManagerShellCommand that enables LaunchAnyWhere attacks through thread context manipulation.
